item.title: My Certificates
item.description: <!DOCTYPE html> AWS Specialization AWS Cloud Technical Essentials Learn how to distinguish among several AWS compute services, including Amazon EC2, AWS Lambda, and Amazon ECS View on Coursera AWS Fundamentals: Migrating to the Cloud Learn how to Migrate to the Cloud.
